comments:
Description:
Preview web viewer error when insert data with own binding to list footer

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a list, bind it to dataset
2. Insert a data item to list footer and bind it to dataset
3. Preview in web viewer/html/pdf

Expected result:
Preview is ok

Actual result:
In Web Viewer, I got below errors:
Error0 : Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "row["OFFICECODE"]".

This issue still exists, so reopen it.

In step2, I binded the data item to another dataset(dataset2) and use it to display column in dataset2, but in rendered xml source I found that the binding for dataset2 is not generated, I think that's the cause.

The binding column definition of the data item (in the list footer) is missing in the report design.

The creatd design is:
<data id="65">
<property name="dataSet">Data Set1</property>
<property name="resultSetColumn">CUSTOMERNUMBER</property>
</data>

Actually, it should be:
<data id="65">
<property name="dataSet">Data Set1</property>
<list-property> bindings... </list-property>
<property name="resultSetColumn">CUSTOMERNUMBER</property>
</data>
Fix the column binding logic. Now the column bindings can be saved correctly.
